Tweedie log density

Source: R/re-exports.R
ldTweedie.Rd

Computes log density for Tweedie distribution. Utility function for Tweedie family.

Usage

ldTweedie(
  y,
  mu = y,
  p = 1.5,
  phi = 1,
  rho = NA,
  theta = NA,
  a = 1.001,
  b = 1.999,
  all.derivs = FALSE
)

See also

ldTweedie, tw()

Examples

# ldTweedie(y = data, mu = fitted_values, p = 1.5, phi = 1)
